title: Supervirus
description: In the first book of the Supervirus series, a youth with a powerful mind amazes and terrifies the stock market and the National Security Agency. A group of elite operatives is dispatched to locate him and it stumbles across his monumental creation. Through a few bizarre twists of fate, an unlikely hero emerges in a struggle that could mark the beginning of a new era."An important moment in history is like a beam of light. Some people see it and rush to it like moths. Other people just happen to discover that the beam of light is shining upon them."
author: Andrew W. Mitchell
